title: Tropical Thailand Five-Star Boutique Retreat on Secluded Koh Kood Island
description: Discover exclusive and unparalleled luxury in a secluded paradise in the glistening waters of the Gulf of Thailand with a stay at Soneva Kiri - a boutique oasis with just 33 private villas perched on the clifftops of Koh Kood island. Surrounded by thick tropical jungle, you will lose yourself in the absolute beauty of this resort, a five-star  tropical escape boasting exquisite culinary concepts, intuitive wellness and eco-friendly travel. Treat your tastebuds to various cuisines offered at the seven onsite restaurants, or indulge in a smaller snack at the cheese deli, ice cream parlour and chocolate bar. Find your bliss at Soneva Kiri Spa, a refuge made to pamper and relax. All the while, enjoy exceptional amenities, included a dedicated Barefoot Guardian offering personalised service 24 hours a day.
offer_address: 110, Tambon Ko Kut, Ko Kut District, Trat 23000, Thailand
